title: Giant Poro Plushie
body:
Heyo~ I posted [this](http://i.imgur.com/PAFFHst.jpg) over in the forum but it occurred to me that's going away pretty darn soon. Thus I decided to pop on over here and share with the world the rather large (HEH) project I've recently finished~

This fellow was a blast to make, even if he isn't technically anatomically correct according to canon poro lore. There's a few things I'll do differently next time, especially regarding that anatomically correct business. :D

http://imgur.com/a/N9NzT

Hope you like. Also: BONUS CAT!

replies.body: ITS SO FLUFFY IM GONNA DIE
I didn't really get the scale of it until I saw the cat beside it. Very nice!

At the moment I'm not quite sure. It takes a fair bit of time to put together and there's a lot of not cheap materials involved. The total cost in man hours and materials is up in the triple digits and I'm not really sure there's too many who'd be into that price range. Not to mention the exorbitant price of shipping from my Canadian location to wherever else in the world someone would want to see it arrive!

That said it's something I'd be happy to work out in private with anyone who's actually really into the idea of owning a giant huggable Poro!
Interested, also a fine loving canadian :)
Check me out on devinatArt. It's the same name as I use here so it's easy enough to find!
Needs a version with a mustache ;).
All of the sudden, my life feels incomplete >.<
Love it-- bonus cat and all!
it's SO CUTE. Have 10 biscuits ^_^ plus it like one of those angry bird plush kinda :p just even more KUTE!

Aw thanks! :) Yeah then scale of the bugger can be tricky to really get until you see it next to things. It's bigger than my torso! I'm really looking forward to making another one of these ASAP, it's so cuddly and I want one for myself hehehe~~
remember poro's bellies have a heart on them to show they are made of pure love and happiness {{item:2052}}
